sentences.en: A large crowd crushed past the barrier.
sentences.cn: 大群的人挤过了障碍物.

sentences.en: A train plowed into the barrier at the end of the platform.
sentences.cn: 火车撞上了月台尽头的栅栏。

sentences.en: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.cn: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.en: England's World Cup hero is determined to play through the pain barrier.
sentences.cn: 英格兰的世界杯英雄决定带伤上阵。

sentences.en: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
He was one of the last of the crowd to pass through the barrier.
sentences.cn: 他是那群人里最后一批跨越障碍的。

sentences.en: I broke through the poverty barrier and it was education that did it.
sentences.cn: 我摆脱了贫困，这要归功于教育。

sentences.en: I realized I had to surmount the language barrier.
sentences.cn: 我意识到我不得不克服语言障碍。

sentences.en: Lack of confidence is the biggest barrier to investment in the region.
sentences.cn: 缺乏信心是在这一地区投资的最大障碍.

sentences.en: She had been waiting for Simon to break down the barrier between them.
sentences.cn: 她一直在等待西蒙打破他们之间的隔阂。

sentences.en: She took a step nearer to the barrier.
sentences.cn: 她朝障碍物又迈近了一步.
年龄障碍看来是无法逾越的.

sentences.en: The angry crowds would not keep back the barrier.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的人群不肯站在栅栏后面.

sentences.en: The lorry went into a skid and crashed into the barrier.
sentences.cn: 卡车失控打滑撞到障碍物上.

sentences.en: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

sentences.en: The packaging must provide an effective barrier to prevent contamination of the product.
sentences.cn: 包装必须提供有效的保护，以免产品受污染。

sentences.en: We want to promote cosmetics that appeal across the colour barrier.
sentences.cn: 我们想推销各种肤色的人都喜欢的化妆品。

sentences.en: You must show your ticket at the barrier.
sentences.cn: 你在关卡处必须出示许可证.

phrases.tran_cn: 防护性能；隔离性，不透气性
屏障系统；柱式开采法；栅栏系统
阻火器；防火墙；防火煤柱；防火隔板
遮壁；防护栏杆；防护栅障
安全势垒，安全栅；停机拦截网

trans.tran_cn: 屏障，障碍，界限，壁垒，隔阂，阻碍，关口，栅栏，挡板
trans.tran_en: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do
